Subskills.name: Ice Travel
Subskills.description: Increases the range of portal of ice.

Subskills.name: Cold-enhanced Warp
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by portal of ice.

Subskills.name: Hailstorm Orb
Subskills.description: Conjure a static orb of frost at target location for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Spiky Approach
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to conjure multiple orbiting icicles dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Engulfing Nova
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of portal of ice.

Subskills.name: Blink Faster
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using portal of ice.

Subskills.name: Corrosive Frostbite
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Shredding Chillstep
Subskills.description: Gain a stack of shredding chillstep on cast increasing your cold skill damage for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Crystallized Pinnacles
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash small frost novas on hit inflicting frostbite.

Subskills.name: Efficient Iceblink
Subskills.description: Reduces the mana cost of portal of ice.

Subskills.name: Cryo Armor
Subskills.description: Increases your all resistances on cast for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Icecold Bloodthirst
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Winter Aparition
Subskills.description: Chance to summon a small blizzard on hit for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Permafrost Voidpull
Subskills.description: Increases damage and area of effect radius pulling monsters towards you on hit.
